name: Big Shots!
description:
Just tap to shoot.

Try to make swishes and earn coins to unlock new characters and interesting basketballs. Every character is different; some shoot high, some shoot low, some earn triple points and some earn double coins. You'll have to unlock them all to find out which is the best!

Beat hundreds of levels to prove that you have what it takes and unlock every ball and character to create the best basketball player.

Do you have what it takes to be the best?
